title: Shields in Reworked Champions
body: I know that this is a bit of a weird nitpick on the Riot champion design but I noticed something. When Riot has reworked a champion (ie: Taric {{champion:44}}) They removed the shield in his design. Similar champs such as Poppy {{champion:78}} (Though she still kinda has her shield), and the old Sejuani {{champion:113}}. Only Leona has her shield now. RIP Shields {{item:1054}}.
